feathercm package¶

Submodules¶

feathercm.data module¶

feathercm.data¶

data class for FeAtHEr-Cm

class feathercm.data.data(*argv)¶

Bases: object

append(item)¶

Appends item onto val

fromRaw(which, value)¶

Converts a reading into a value

processData()¶

Converts reading data into values

toCurrent(value)¶

Convert raw value to a current

toInvertedVoltage(value)¶

Convert raw value to a voltage

toReading(voltage)¶
toTime(value)¶

Convert raw value into a time, possibly useful for prefix conversion

toVoltage(value)¶

Convert raw value to a voltage

Parameters

value – 16-bit integer, typically from ADC/DAC

Returns

value rescaled as a voltage

Return type

float

This module contains the set of exceptions for feathercm

feathercm.settings module¶

feathercm.settings¶

globally relevant settings for FeAtHEr-Cm

Module contents¶

FeAtHEr-Cm library¶

FeAtHEr-Cm is a suite of inexpensive scientific instruments built around the M4 Express Feather and written in python.

A review of Voltammetry fundamentals source

By BoB LeSuer (BoBthechemist)
